01.query: SELECT DISTINCT ?title ?desc ?entity_type ?inception WHERE { VALUES ?obj {} OPTIONAL {?obj wdt:P1476 ?title . FILTER(lang(?title) = "it")} OPTIONAL {?obj schema:description ?desc . FILTER(lang(?desc) = "en") } OPTIONAL {?obj wdt:P31 ?type . ?type rdfs:label ?entity_type . FILTER(lang(?entity_type) = "en")} OPTIONAL {?obj wdt:P571 ?inception .}} LIMIT 1

02.query: SELECT ?countryLabel (COUNT(?painting) AS ?paintingCount) WHERE {VALUES ?obj {} ?obj wdt:P571 ?objInception . ?painting wdt:P571 ?objInception ; wdt:P17 ?country . SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "[AUTO_LANGUAGE],en". }} GROUP BY ?countryLabel
02.html_content: Geographic Distribution of paintings of Same Period
